Sentencas: In order to sustain solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) net output power and prevent violation of oxygen excess ratio (OER) constraint and fuel utilization (FU) constraint, a data-driven gas supply system coordination management method is proposed.
Titulo: Distributed deep reinforcement learning-based gas supply system coordination management method for solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Accordingly, a population evolution-based multi-agent double delay deep deterministic policy gradient (PE-MA4DPG) algorithm is introduced.
Titulo: Distributed deep reinforcement learning-based gas supply system coordination management method for solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The artificial intelligence design of the algorithm is guided by the concepts of imitation learning and curriculum learning, whereby different agents of different combinations are trained in different environments, thus improving the robustness of the coordination strategy.
Titulo: Distributed deep reinforcement learning-based gas supply system coordination management method for solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: In this algorithm, the hydrogen controller and the air controller are treated as two agents.
Titulo: Distributed deep reinforcement learning-based gas supply system coordination management method for solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The centralized training enables agents with different objectives to coordinate with each other.
Titulo: Distributed deep reinforcement learning-based gas supply system coordination management method for solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The effectiveness of the proposed algorithm is demonstrated in three experiments, wherein the proposed algorithm is compared with a group of existing algorithms.
Titulo: Distributed deep reinforcement learning-based gas supply system coordination management method for solid oxide fuel cell
